ygData.subject: RE: Kith Nerfed!!! Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh, last night I paid my first visit to the Kithicor since the change.  On the first pull a undead cleric game and right behind it was a Guide with the
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Andrew Simpson" <hornsfan@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Kith Nerfed!!! Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
>Date: Thu, 04 Nov 1999 19:07:49 CST
>
> >It used to be one of the most totally scary zones we had. Even if there
> >were no really bad mobs in there (after level 20/25 when ghouls go green)
> >it
> >was still scary - dark, foggy, ucky noises and all.
>
>Hmm, I was there last night and it was as dark and foggy as always.
>
>This time, however, I had the pleasure of getting attacked by an enraged
>dire wolf who was yellow to me! He triple attacked for 77,97, 93. Ouch!!
>
>I was waiting for the Blair Witch to pop out. :)
>
>Anthem Dirgemaker
>Level 39 Bard of Qeynos

Heh, last night I paid my first visit to the Kithicor since the change. On
the first pull a undead cleric game and right behind it was a Guide with the
name Amie The Witch! At first I did not notice it was a Guide hehe. Also
last night the zone was menaced by a Sand Giant sized halfling named Mennix
(my servers GM). We also had to deal with lots of Bixie trains, other then
that it was a fun night :)

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
